mapper.insert: insert into secret_key(app_id, app_key, app_secret, app_token) value (#{appId},#{appKey},#{appSecret},#{appToken});
mapper.select: select sk.app_id,a.app_name,sk.app_key,sk.app_secret,group_concat(r.role_name) as role from secret_key as sk left join app as a on sk.app_id=a.id left join app_role as ar on ar.app_id=sk.app_id and ar.is_flag=0 left join role as r on r.id=ar.role_id where sk.app_key=#{appKey} and sk.app_secret=#{appSecret}
